ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine recognizes a note of power in Striker s voice. It reminded him of an Alpha wolf, the pack leader. Just the tone of his commands showed that Striker

Lunarpine recognizes a note of power in Striker's voice. It reminded 
him of an Alpha wolf, the pack leader. Just the tone of his commands 
showed that Striker was a bot programmed for leadership. Striker knew 
when to command and when to back down. Striker came across as a 
leader, but not THE leader. 

Lunarpine looked at the damaged ship and asked, "Should I stay and 
help fortify a defensive perimeter, most likely we weren't the only 
one to detect the crash." Or do you want me to accompany you back to 
the Ark?

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker/Ramulus/Kluster::
> 
> "No," Striker replies on his comm-link, "All the survivors are in 
more or 
> less good shape. The rest died in the crash or the battle."
> 
> He stands up, looking at Kluster. "I'll go get the Maximals to get 
ready to 
> move," he says, walking out of the ship. He looks at Lunarpine and 
transforms 
> into his beast mode.
> 
> "Let's get back to the Ark and get all the Maximals together," 
Striker says, 
> running off toward the Ark.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus nods. His scanners were reporting that Primal was a 
Maximal. Ramulus 
> looks from Primal to the Ark.
> 
> "Our base is kinda damaged. We're moving to a new one," he 
says, "I'm here to 
> get everyone ready to move."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> As the missiles fired by the Predacon base head toward the 
Cybertronian Fire, 
> the Maximal battle cruiser's scanners pick them up, alerting the 
autoguns and 
> laser batteries into position.
> 
> The missiles aproach the ship.
> 
> The laser batteries open fire on the advancing missiles, destroying 
two 
> before the third hits the shields, being destroyed by them.
> 
> Inside the ship, Kluster jumps to his feet. "So, the Preds decide 
to play 
> rough, eh?"
> 
> He grins. "Computer, fire six missiles at the source of recent 
attack."
> 
> "Acnowledged." Three of the four missile launchers on the 
Cybertronian Fire 
> swirl to position, each one firing two missiles, the missiles 
heading for the 
> Predacon base.
